title: DNA 360 Functional Genomics Test & Reports
description: Discover exactly which foods, supplements, workouts, environment, and lifestyle are right for you based on your unique DNA. Then, reach peak health by giving your body exactly what it needs.

title: DNAging Epigenetic Test & Reports
description: With DNAging, your biological age becomes more than a numerical value – it's a roadmap, a compass guiding you toward a life of vitality and well-being. Our cutting-edge technology peels back the layers of your DNA, uncovering the secrets encoded in your genes and epigenetic markers.

title: DNA Breast 360 Breast Cancer Screening & Reports
description: The DNA Breast 360 is a groundbreaking, non-invasive breast cancer screening test that analyzes specific proteins in tears to detect early signs of breast cancer.

title: DNA Gut 360 PREMIUM Comprehensive Microbiome Test
description: From digestion to immunity and beyond, DNA Gut 360 Premium is your guide to understanding the critical role your microbiome plays in overall health.

title: PGX Pharmacogenomics Test & Reports
description: PGX is a state-of-the-art DNA test that redefines how you approach healthcare. With PGX, you'll confidently navigate the selection and dosage of medications, ensuring they align seamlessly with your genetic profile.

title: DNAging PREMIUM Biological Age Test & Reports
description: DNAging PREMIUM is the most comprehensive epigenetic test available for those who want to take control of their aging process.

title: Longevity Bundle: DNA 360 & DNAging
description: Our Longevity Bundle includes the DNA 360 Functional Genomics Test and the DNAging Epigenetic Test, providing a deep dive into your genetic and epigenetic makeup.

title: Annual Vitality Bundle: DNAging, DNA Gut 360, & DNA Liquid B
description: Introducing the DNA Vitality Annual Testing Bundle, a complete health assessment package crafted to give you personalized insights for your best possible health.

title: Liquid Biopsy Cancer Screening Bundle
description: This bundle is a breakthrough in the detection and management of cancer. Pairing our tests with the Galleri® test from GRAIL offers a powerful tool for early detection, treatment evaluation, and monitoring for potential recurrence.

title: Genetic Insights Bundle: DNA 360 & PGX
description: The Ultimate Genetic Insights Bundle is an advanced testing package meticulously crafted to transform your approach to health and wellness.  This bundle includes a personalized consultation with a skilled clinician solely focused on interpreting your PGX test results. This ensures you understand and are able to effectively apply these insights to optimize your health.

title: Mira Hormone Monitor: Max Starter Kit
description: No more guessing. Monitor your hormones at home to make confident decisions about your fertility. The Mira Max Starter Kit is an all-around solution for hormone tracking.

title: Mira Hormone Monitor: 20 Fertility Max Wands Refill
description: Maximize your fertility journey with a single reading. The Mira Max Wands track 3 key fertility hormones (LH + E3G + PdG) at once via the Mira Fertility Tracker. Predict, confirm, and pinpoint your fertile window. Get real-time numerical stats, hormone concentrations, and plan your fertility journey with clarity. Max Kit required for use.

title: Mira Hormone Monitor: 20 Ovum Wands Refill
description: Tracks FSH! Measure the hormone in charge of your fertility plans, get insight into your ovulation days, and find out if you're ready for a healthy pregnancy, or get assistance in detecting menopause. Max Kit required for use.

title: DNABlueprint Living Health Program
description: Your DNABlueprint: Living Program is the entry level into your physical genome. Imagine, discovering the right way to eat, exercise, and the foods that are authentic to your genetics. In this experience you will develop a plan with your Functional Genomics Practitioner to better understand why your body reacts in certain ways to life, the environment, food, and much more. This is a great way to start on your path to exceptional health and wellness.

title: DNABlueprint Lifestyle Health Program
description: The DNABlueprint: Lifestyle Program is a plan, unlike any other. This is the path to your ultimate health. Your dedicated Functional Genomic Practitioner will lead you through your genetic blueprint and help you design your optimal health Lifestyle. You will have an expert perform audits of your diet, nutrition, lifestyle, home, and work environments to identify challenges that could be damaging your health. True health optimization starts with investigating every aspect of your life.

title: DNABlueprint Longevity Health Program
description: This is the pinnacle experience for anyone who wants to live a full, vibrant, and exceptional life! Imagine, having the owner’s manual to your body. Having the tools to avoid, eliminate, eradicate, and defend against chronic conditions and disease. What can your body process authentically regarding food? What environmental challenges will affect you more intensely? What is your true biological age? And how can you put years back on your life?

title: The DNA4Men Personalized Health Program
description: The DNA4Men program is a groundbreaking approach designed to fill the critical gaps in men’s healthcare, offering personalized, genetics-informed solutions to optimize health, longevity, and mental well-being.

title: The DNA4Women Personalized Health Program
description: The DNA4Women program is a revolutionary approach to women’s healthcare, designed to address the unique health challenges women face with personalized, genetics-informed solutions.
